xyz.fsgik.common.net.tcp

接口 FsTcpEndpoint

  • 所有已知子接口:
    FsTcpClient, FsTcpServer

    public interface FsTcpEndpoint
    This interface represent an endpoint on the TCP/IP network: server or client.
    另请参阅:
    FsTcpServer, FsTcpClient

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void close()
      Closes this point, blocks current thread for buffered operations.
      void close(@Nullable java.time.Duration timeout)
      Closes this point, blocks current thread for buffered operations in given timeout.
      void closeNow()
      Closes this point immediately, without blocking and buffered operations.
      java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
      Returns bound address of this point.
      int getPort()
      Returns bound port of this point.
      java.net.SocketAddress getSocketAddress()
      Returns bound socket address of this point.
      java.lang.Object getSource()
      Returns underlying object which implements this interface, such as ServerSocket or Socket.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns whether this point is closed.
      boolean isOpened()
      Returns whether this point is opened.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAddress

        java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
        Returns bound address of this point.

        bound address of this point

        Returns bound port of this point.
        返回:

        Returns bound socket address of this point.
        返回:

      • getSource

        java.lang.Object getSource()
        Returns underlying object which implements this interface, such as ServerSocket or Socket.
        返回:
        underlying object

      • isOpened

        boolean isOpened()
        Returns whether this point is opened.
        返回:
        whether this point is opened

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Returns whether this point is closed.
        返回:
        whether this point is closed

      • close

        default void close()
        Closes this point, blocks current thread for buffered operations.

      • close

        void close(@Nullable
           @Nullable java.time.Duration timeout)
        Closes this point, blocks current thread for buffered operations in given timeout.
        参数:
        timeout - given timeout, maybe null to always wait

      • closeNow

        void closeNow()
        Closes this point immediately, without blocking and buffered operations.
